videos.headline: Indiana RB has ups
videos.description: Indiana RB Devine Redding hurdles over a Purdue defender as part of his first down run.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Indiana RB has ups) 2015/11/28 ESHEET PVC

videos.headline: Sudfeld hits Booker for 72-yard TD
videos.description: Indiana QB Nate Sudfeld connects with Andre Booker for a 72-yard touchdown to put the Hoosiers ahead 51-36.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Sudfeld hits Booker for 72-yard TD) 2015/11/28 ESHEET PVC
